trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.
The ControlIDConverter class derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.StringConverter> class and provides a list of control IDs for display in a property grid control in design-time environments.

The ControlIDConverter class also serves as the base class for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter> classes, which are type converters for Web controls and controls that support validation property attributes, respectively.
For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [Generalized Type Conversion](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter"></xref> class.

Returns a value indicating whether the control ID of the specified control is added to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> method.
The control instance to test for inclusion in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Returns a collection of control IDs from the container within the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> when provided with a format context.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.FilterControl%2A> method is called on each control found in the container.
The control ID is only added to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> if the method returns `true`.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a set of strings representing the control IDs of the controls in the current container.
If no controls are currently contained, an empty collection is returned.
If the context is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or there is no current container, then <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.

Returns a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list of possible values, using the specified context.
As implemented in this class, this method always returns `false`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Returns a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of control ID values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of control ID values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

This implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the context is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
